Group (2023-present):

Introduction

Eun Seop is a South Korean singer under Fantagio. He made his official debut as a member of the boy group LUN8 on June 15, 2023.

On January 20, 2025 Fantagio announced that members Dohyun and Eunho would be going on hiatus due to health issues while also announcing the departure of Eunseop due to health reasons.
